name: Void-a-Nomicon
description:
In this game, you are trying to unlock the secrets of the void-a-nomicon an ancient book that contains the recipes for all things in the universe. you start out with nothing more than the power of bevy and must unlock the rest of the universe, first by creating it, then by exploring the different ways of combining the new elements.

given enough time and progress, many new things can be created.

how to play...

drag items on top of each other to create a combination of the two.

each time you start the game you get 1 bevy(or you can press 'b' to get more without having to restart)

combining a bevy with items my unlock new game features.

you can add new items and recipes to the game by adding or editing the files

feel free to shair your mod files and ideas for features with me on discord PhaestusFox#8078 or github https://github.com/PhaestusFox/void-a-nomicon and ill add the mods to the game and try add some of the features
